attributes.action: Put an end to professional politicians - put a minimum age of 40 for all MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There used to be a time when this country was lead by a government made up from mature & successful leaders of industry, business etc. These days a lot of people enter politics straight from school without ever having a real job or finding out how the laws of the country effect ordinary citizens.  How can these people know what problems british people face when they have never had to experience these problems themselves?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
